<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在当今企业级应用开发中，可靠的任务调度系统已成为支撑业务连续性的关键基础设施。今天大姚给大家分享一个基于 .NET 开源、功能齐全的分布式作业调度系统：Sundial。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>系统介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Sundial 是一个基于 .NET 开源（<span>MIT License）、功能齐全的分布式作业调度系统，它可从最小的应用程序到大型企业系统使用。</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250809144124978-1751057988.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>首先我们创建一个名为：<code><span>SundialExercises</span></code><span>&nbsp;.NET 9 控制台应用:</span></span></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>引入 Sundial NuGet 包</span></h2>
<p><span><span>在 NuGet 包管理器中搜索：<code><span>Sundial</span></code><span>&nbsp;进行安装。</span></span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250809144214222-853778385.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>自定义任务</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>创建自定义任务 CustomJob 并实现 IJob 接口：</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> CustomJob : IJob
    {
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">readonly</span> ILogger&lt;CustomJob&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> _logger;

        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> CustomJob(ILogger&lt;CustomJob&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> logger)
        {
            _logger </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> logger;
        }

        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Task ExecuteAsync(JobExecutingContext context, CancellationToken stoppingToken)
        {
            _logger.LogInformation(context.ToString());
            Console.WriteLine($</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">[{DateTime.Now:HH:mm:ss}] 任务执行中...</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Task.CompletedTask;
        }
    }</span></pre>
</div>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>注册 Sundial 作业并配置触发器</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在 Program.cs 中注册 Sundial 作业并配置触发器：</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>            <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 注册 Sundial 作业并配置触发器</span>
            builder.Services.AddSchedule(options =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
            {
                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 添加自定义任务（每5秒执行）
                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">options.AddJob&lt;CustomJob&gt;(Triggers.PeriodSeconds(5));

                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 添加自定义任务（每10秒执行）</span>
                options.AddJob&lt;CustomJob&gt;(Triggers.PeriodSeconds(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">10</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">));

                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">.NET Cron 表达式解析库 TimeCrontab：</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1); text-decoration: underline">https://gitee.com/dotnetchina/TimeCrontab</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">var crontab = Crontab.DailyAt(3); </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 每天第 3 小时正（点）
                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">var crontab = Crontab.WeeklyAt("WED");  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> SUN（星期天），MON，TUE，WED，THU，FRI，SAT
                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">var crontab = Crontab.YearlyAt(3); </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 每年第 3，5，6 月 1 日零点正
                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">options.AddJob&lt;CustomJob&gt;(Triggers.Cron(crontab.ToString()));</span>
            });</pre>
</div>
